projects.title: Getting Started
list1: Type 1. + space to create an ordered list, - for bullet points and [] for a todo list. You can indent using tabs.
Mark any text and use keyboard shortcuts or toolbar to make text bold (cmd+b), italic (cmd+shift+i) or underscored (cmd+u)
Insert images by dropping them, pasting them or inserting from the toolbar.
Paste Youtube links to embed them
list2: Submission type: how the user will prove that he/she completed the quest. All types except URL and image can be automatically validated
Recurrence: how often the user can complete the quest.
Conditions: controls which users and when they can access the quest
